text:
Hello. Our client has some users who are not receiving the membership invite/registration links. We can see the email has been sent, but we need to get access to the unique URL to manually send to the user.

How do we get this URL for a user?

```<https://clients.whatever.com/_hcms/mem/register?redirect_url=%2F_hcms%2Fmem%2Flogin%3Fsuccess%3Dtrue%26content_id%zxy&registrationCode=xxxxxxssssssdddddd>```
